hero.subtitle: Welcome to
hero.title: Trygg Hemservice
hero.desc: We offer professional cleaning and keyholding services for private homes and rental properties. Convenient, safe, and flexible - we take care of your home when you can't.

services.subtitle: Our services
services.title: Everything for a safe and clean home

cleaning.title: Cleaning
cleaning.desc: Complete home cleaning tailored to your needs - we make sure your home always feels fresh and welcoming.

keyholding.title: Keyholding
keyholding.desc: Secure key management and regular property checks - perfect when you rent out or are away.

how.title: How it works
how.desc: Simply sign a contract with us and choose the package that suits you. You'll get clear information about prices, tax deductions, and what's included. Want to know more? Click below.

contact.desc: We want to make it easy for you to get in touch. Fill in the form and we'll get back to you shortly. You can also reach us directly via phone (WhatsApp) or email.
